document.docAuthor: Zhong, Hua, Yang, Lian-Fang & Morse, John C.
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Plectrocnemia Stephens in China (Trichoptera, Polycentropodidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Plectrocnemia Stephens in China (Trichoptera, Polycentropodidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Kyopsyche tsukuiensis
Kobayashi 1984
: 4
â€“5 (male); type locality: Japan .

Plectrocnemia sinualis Wang & Yang 1997
in Yang et al. 1997 (Henan, China ), syn. nov.
Plectrocnemia tsukuiensis (Kobayashi)
;
Ohkawa & Ito 2007
: 193
, 195.

subSubSection.paragraph:
This is a widely distributed species in China . In a comparison with the drawings and description provided by
Ohkawa & Ito ( 2007 )
, we consider
Plectrocnemia sinualis Wang & Yang
to be a synonym of
P. tsukuiensis (Kobayashi)
.
